definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
see 上聲|上声[shang3 sheng1]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
Shanghai municipality, central east China, abbr. to 滬|沪[Hu4]
that level or higher/that amount or more/the above-mentioned/(used to indicate that one has completed one's remarks) That is all.
to hit the market (of a new product)/to float (a company on the stock market)
morning/CL:個|个[ge4]
to rise/to go up
to rise/to go up/to ascend
evening/night/CL:個|个[ge4]/in the evening
plus/to put in/to add/to add on/to add into/in addition/on top of that
aforementioned/above-mentioned
in fact/in reality/as a matter of fact/in practice
last week
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
in fact/in reality/actually/as a matter of fact/de facto/ipso facto
on top of/above-mentioned/also pr. [shang4 mian5]

sentences.english: I'm sorry, I'm not in a position to help you financially.
sentences.chinese: 我很抱歉，我沒辦法在財務上幫你忙。

sentences.english: Many disaster will happen every day in the world.
sentences.chinese: 在這個世界上，天天都邑發生很多災難性的工作。

sentences.english: It's necessary for us to net the currant bushes.
sentences.chinese: 我們有必要用網蓋上紅醋栗樹。

sentences.english: They love to run about on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 他們喜歡在海灘上跑來跑去。

sentences.english: They're less likely to nitpick about details that aren't relevant at this stage.
sentences.chinese: 減少他們在與主題不相關的細節上的吹毛求疵。

sentences.english: He came in, holding a cigarette between his lips.
sentences.chinese: 他嘴上叨着香菸走了進來。

sentences.english: Standing on the starting line, we're all cowards.
sentences.chinese: 站在起跑線上，我們都是膽小者。

sentences.english: I got a splinter in my finger while I was moving the boxes.
sentences.chinese: 我在搬箱子的時候手指頭上紮了一根刺。

sentences.english: Port of Spain , on Trinidad , is the capital.
sentences.chinese: 特立尼達島上的西班牙港是國家的首都。

sentences.english: He clipped an electronic pulse reader tohis finger.
sentences.chinese: 他把電子脈搏計夾到手指上。

sentences.english: For the past few days, there has instead been rioting in the square.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的幾天裏，廣場上沒有垃圾，倒是有一場暴亂。

sentences.english: Have you ever known there are such creatures as an albino two-headed snake?
sentences.chinese: 你知道這個世界上有一種叫做雙頭白化蛇的生物嗎？

sentences.english: The bright colours on the wall caught our attention.
sentences.chinese: 牆壁上鮮豔的顏色吸引了我們的注意力。

sentences.english: A. I’m not sure there’s a magic number, per se.
sentences.chinese: 本質上說，我不肯定是否有一個魔力數字。

sentences.english: Of these four things , the first is your legal due.
sentences.chinese: 這四種中的第一件是你法律上應享的權力。

sentences.english: One day, Einstein was walking in a street in New Youk.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，愛因斯坦走在紐約的大街上。

definition: Shangdu, also known as Xanadu, summer capital of the Yuan Dynasty (1279-1368)

aim/clear
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
really and truly
see 的士[di1 shi4]
on top of/above-mentioned/also pr. [shang4 mian5]
(of eyes) bright/clear-sighted/to understand clearly
to watch from a height or distance/to survey
unofficial variant of 瞭[liao4]
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
surname He/Japanese (food, clothes etc)
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
surname Ye
China/Chinese/surname Zhong
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)
within/among/in/middle/center/while (doing sth)/during/(dialect) OK/all right
and/besides/moreover/furthermore/in addition
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
before/prior to/ago/previously/beforehand
but/yet/however/only/merely/still
but/however
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
